channel.title: Clan Chat Capitalization. [PI]
channel.description:
In Clan Chat, every first letter of a word and every letter after a punctuation is capitalized. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/219nqsg.jpg[/img]
I read the tutorial [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498391.0.html]here[/url], but it didn't work.

item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

Oh geez. Thanks, I guess this capitalization will have to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Chat Capitalization. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Dayne, post:5, topic:402387”]I keep getting an error with an error pointing to the period in .toUpperCase
But when I remove the period it points to the “t” in to and so on and so forth.
And if I delete the line I get more errors than what I started with. :[[/quote]

That’s because charAt(int) returns a primitive char value. Since Strings are immutable, there’s no easy way to change them. The best thing I can suggest is creating a method that returns a formatted string.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Chat Capitalization. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Dayne, post:1, topic:402387”]In Clan Chat, every first letter of a word and every letter after a punctuation is capitalized.

I read the tutorial here, but it didn’t work.[/quote]
That tutorial isn’t for that, it’s so that the owner of the clan system is the first person to join. Find the / command in commands.java it should be first. I need the code to help.
